dropdown.label: Shop Small<sup>®</sup> and Small Business Saturday<sup>®</sup>

login.title: Welcome to the American Express Resource Center
login.body: On this site, you can access valuable information and resources designed to help you acquire and engage merchants, and promote the value of American Express<sup>®</sup> Card acceptance to your customers. Enter your passcode below to access the site and get started.
login.errorMessage: The passcode you entered is invalid.
login.helpText: Don't know your passcode? Please contact your American Express representative for assistance.
login.agreement: You understand and agree that use of the American Express Resource Center and any content that may be obtained there from is at your sole risk. The American Express Resource Center and all content is provided "as is" without any warranty of any kind, either express or implied.

categories.heroBody: Use these resources to help understand and promote the value and benefits of American Express<sup>®</sup> Card acceptance.

items.title: Signings and Sales Support
items.body: Acquire and onboard new customers by sharing the benefits and value of the American Express network.

items.title: Customer Engagement and Activation
items.body: Engage customers with point-of-sale materials, terminal set-up and best practices.

items.title: Customer Growth and Retention
items.body: Drive loyalty and growth by providing customers with value-enhancing programs and materials.

items.title: Shop Small<sup>®1</sup> and Small Business Saturday<sup>®1</sup>
items.body: Help your small merchants stand out and attract new customers through Shop Small, a nationwide movement dedicated to supporting small business year-round.

items.title: More Resources
items.body: Access additional assets and tools to help you expand your knowledge about the American Express network.

categories.footnotes: 1Shop Small and Small Business Saturday resources are not currently available to OptBlue merchants.

nav.title: Signings and Sales Support
nav.body: Use these resources to help connect with prospective customers, convey the benefits of the network and promote the value of American Express® Card acceptance.

knowledgeCenter.title: Help Your Customers Grow and Manage Their Businesses
knowledgeCenter.body:
The Knowledge Center helps keep your customers informed with articles, videos and insider insights to help make their businesses even more successful.

Member Insights: Tapping Technology to Streamline Business

Focus on Fraud Protection

contentPlaybook.body: Learn how you can share valuable Knowledge Center content with your customers through your own channels.
